alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 19 at 4:51PM PST until February 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Indian Wells Valley, Mojave Desert Slopes and Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but not limited to: Highway 14, Highway 58, US Highway 395, Highway 178.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
